item.title: How I Updated, Built, and Deployed to Launchpad an Ubuntu/Debian Package
item.description: I wanted to build Unbound from source for my Pi-hole running Armbian (a debian fork for ARM SBC) for my Banana Pi M2 Zero (a clone of the Raspberry Pi Zero) so that I could enable its cachedb module following this thread for potentially speeding up DNS queries on my local network. This lead me down the rabbit hole of building C-based Debian packages from source. Setup sudo apt-get install -y sbuild debhelper ubuntu-dev-tools git-buildpackage
